Item Weight 2.57 pounds
Manufacturer QZYL
ASIN B0BDR2JMWD
Item model number L042OD
Best Sellers Rank #8,630 in Patio, Lawn & Garden (See Top 100 in Patio, Lawn & Garden)
#260 in Outdoor Lighted Holiday Displays

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:11:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame IP Rating: IP44 waterproof Boxes Spacing: 10 in Lead Length: 118 in Bulb QTY: 60 count Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A Output: 4.5V,1A Power: AC/DC

Attractive Design – The lighted gift boxes are designed with Christmas elements like snowflakes pattern, pine cones, pine needles, red berries and classic Christmas colors, red, green and blue. The bows are detachable, you can attach them to different boxes as you like
3 Sizes Light Up Christmas Presents – 10″x10″x10″ large red box with 25 led bulbs, 8″x8″x8″ medium green box with 20 led bulbs, 6″x6″x6″ small blue box with 15 led bulbs. The lights are warm white, creating a cozy Christmas atmosphere
Easy to Install and Disassemble – Just insert support rods into the boxes, and put them anywhere indoors. Use the stakes to fix them to the ground if used outdoor. The pop up Christmas gift boxes decorations are retractable for easy storage
Durable Material – Sturdy metal frame supports the Christmas light up decorations. The Scallion cloth covered on the outside is waterproof and not easy to fade. The bulbs are buckled for a beautiful light effect, match your Christmas tree decorations well
Indoor and Outdoor Use – Christmas lighted gift boxes are IP44 waterproof, are perfect outdoor lighted holiday displays for your walkway, yard, porch, or indoor Christmas decorations for locations like living room. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications

  • Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame
  • IP Rating: IP44 waterproof
  • Boxes Spacing: 10 in
  • Lead Length: 118 in
  • Bulb QTY: 60 count
  • Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A
  • Output: 4.5V,1A
  • Power: AC/DC

Read more

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:11:39 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:58:30 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Input voltage
4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5 4.5

OUTDOOR & INDOOR CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS!】You’d love this pre-lit snowman Christmas decor if you are finding something attractive and decorative for the coming winter holiday! This lighted snowman would be the perfect decoration for not only indoor but also outdoor with ground stakes, zip ties, water-resistant power cord and adaptor which make it more stable and durable for outside. Attention: this outdoor Christmas decoration is NOT supposed to be used in heavy windy or rainy days.
【OUTDOOR CHRISTMAS DISPLAY】: BOMMETER 3FT Lighted Pop Up Christmas Snowman Decorations, Pre-Lit Light Up 48 LED Cool White Lights, with top hat and green scarf, Collapsible Easily Metal Stand Easy-Assembly Reusable for Holiday Xmas Indoor Outdoor Decor: Garden & Outdoor
【CHRISTMAS THEMED DECORATIONS】: Snowman wears a sparkling red Santa hat and matching scarf. Glitter and sparkles are woven through for a shimmering look. adorable design adds your Christmas and winter great fun, is the perfect Christmas decoration to greet family and this holiday season.
【48 PRE-LIT LED LIGHTS】: This outdoor lighted Snowman features 48 cool white LED lights, create a glowing nighttime display, Battery design for easy use, will brighten up your Christmas decor by creating an attractive focal point in your yard or porch.
【EASY ASSEMBLE AND STORAGE】: This Snowman yard decoration with collapsible design for quick, easy set up and space saving storage, perfect for a small place, no tools or specialized skills are required, please refer to the detailed installation picture on picture 6. If you have any question for install the snowman, please kindly feel free to tell us.
【COLLAPSIBLE CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS】: This Christmas Snowman come in a nice box that can be a Christmas gift for your family and friends, it can be used to decor your office, the living room, dining room or entryway. Great for Christmas themed Party, Christmas indoor and outdoor decorations, or Christmas yard decoration!








4 FT Height Christmas Outdoor Snowman
4 Ft. Pop up Lighted Christmas Snowman
3FT Pre Illuminated Folding Christmas
3FT Iluminated Folding Christmas Cloth Snowman
4 Ft. Pop up Lighted Christmas Snowman
3 Ft Christmas Folding Outdoor Christmas Penguin
Input voltage 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5 4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:58:30 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 14.57 x 11.81 x 25.98 inches
Item Weight 12.38 pounds
Manufacturer STARRAY
ASIN B0BK8M2PZZ
Item model number STARRAY
Best Sellers Rank #973 in Patio, Lawn & Garden (See Top 100 in Patio, Lawn & Garden)
#26 in Outdoor Lighted Holiday Displays

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Great Christmas Decorations: Made of metal wire, the Christmas deer decorations are durable, corrosion-resistant and can withstand harsh wind and weather conditions. This set of 3 reindeer decoration outdoor yard includes a buck, a doe and a fawn in different poses, with 3D modelling and vivid poses to make the reindeer Christmas decoration look even more charming and cute, it is the perfect Christmas outdoor decorations to welcome your family.
Easy to Assemble: The deer Christmas decorations are easy to assemble without tools, as all the parts snap into place with ease. The stunning deer Christmas decorations can be completed in minutes. Each deer has an individual plug to display them individually or together.
Lighted Design: The outdoor Christmas reindeer has built-in 240 LED lights to create the perfect night display. Just simply plug in and unplug to turn the lights on and off. The lights make the outdoor Christmas reindeer extremely attractive and bring an eye-catching view to your lawn and yard.
Elegant Details: Celebrate the season with a heartwarming snapshot of a deer family, intricately designed with festive details like shining red bows and a shimmery fabric; BUCK DIMENSIONS: 24″(L) x 51″(W) x 60″(H); DOE DIMENSIONS: 22″(L) x 12″(W) x 47″(H); FAWN DIMENSIONS: 18.5″(L) x 6.3″(W) x 27.5″(H)
Perfect for Outdoor Christmas Decorations: The reindeer outdoor decorations are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations. Reindeer outdoor decorations can decorate any place, such as lawns, front porches, patios, gardens. It also makes a great Christmas gift for friends and family.

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Read more

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Input voltage
4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v

【Attractive Christmas Decor】Our lighted snowman is perfect decoration in Christmas season. With pre-lit lights,the outdoor snowman decor is gorgeous yard art to celebrate your Christmas.
Lighted Pop Up Christmas Snowman: Christmas Penguin with 48 LEDs warm white lights at 3FT high, perfect indoor and outdoor Christmas party supplies, brings stronger feeling of Christmas atmosphere and makes it big and attractive Christmas decorations around!
Built-in LED Lights up the Night: Internal 48 LEDs warm white lights create a glowing nighttime display. Each Unit built-in lighting for a vibrant effect and enhanced nighttime visibility. Illuminate your yard for maximum joy that the whole neighborhood can see and enjoy!
Easy to Install & Storage: No tools or specialized skills are required. Very easy to set up and take down. Just takes few minutes to put them together, using the ground stake to fix firmly if displaying outdoors in fine weather. When not in use, the snowman can be folded up and placed in a box. It takes up no space at all. Please refer to the instructions for detailed installation.
Perfect Christmas Decoration: Great for Christmas Themed Party, Indoor & Outdoor Decorations, or yards Decoration! Add stunning reflective theme for your Christmas celebrations. It is suitable for home, patio, lawn, garden, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party and wedding.

3FT Iluminated Folding Christmas Plush Polar

Set of 3 Christmas Lighting Gift Boxes,

return ‘‘;

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Product Description

[ 5 Pack Christmas Lighted Gift Boxes ] 5 Pack lighted Christmas gift boxes with different size include super large: 10*10*12inch, large: 8*8*10inch, medium: 6*6*8inch, small: 5*5*7inch, mini: 4*4*6inch. Each gift box is matched with green, red, gold, silver and blue bows, designed with snowflake patterns, pine cones, red berries and pine needles.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ 80 LED Warm White Lights ] The 80 LED warm white lights inside can passes through the gift box, and reflected on the surface of the gift box, bringing you impressive glowing display effect.
[ Adapter Included ] Just plug and unplug it for power on and off. With 10 feet long lead wire, easy and convenient for outdoor use. The 4.5V-0.8A low voltage is not easy to heat, and it can be used safely.
[ Durable Materials & Compact Storage ] Constructed by sturdy metal frame and covered with yarn material, durable and reusable. They can be stacked one-by-one for compact storage, easy carrying and space saving.
[ Lighted Christmas Present Box Decor ] Suitable for outdoor and indoor Christmas decorations home, Christmas tree, fireplace, room, window, porch, front door, patio, small tree, bedroom, snow, yard, etc.

Product Description

[ 4 Pack Lighted Gift Boxes，Premium Material] The package contains 4 pack light up Christmas gift boxes in 4 different sizes. Super large: 10*10*12inch, large: 8*8*10inch, medium: 6*6*8inch, small: 5*5*7inch. Each box is wrapped with yarn and glitter, and tied with a cute green, silver, red, or gold bow, pine cones and pine needles on the top. Copyright Certificated Model. Premium Material, these Xmas gift boxes are wrapped by Glittering yarn.
[ 70 Glowing Warm Lights & Unique Design ] There are 70 warm white LED lights in the 4 gift boxes. Each box is wrapped with glitter yarn on the surface, the lights can pass through the gift box, it will be reflected on the surface, emit a fairy-tale sparkle effect.
[ Power Adapter ] The power adapter comes with a 10 feet long lead wire. With safe 4.5V-0.3A low voltage, the Christmas lighted gift boxes remain cool to touch, no worry about overheat even working all nights.
[ Premium Material, Easy to Fold and Store ] Premium Material. Crafted with PVC materials and supported by a metal framework for stability and sturdiness. 4 Different sizes of gift boxes can be stacked for easy storage, space saving, and reused for next year.
[ Christmas Decor ] Create a festive and Xmas atmosphere anywhere. Suitable for Christmas indoor outdoor decorations, Christmas tree, fireplace, room, window, porch, outdoor, indoor, front door, patio, small tree, bedroom, snow, yard, and multiple scenes.

From the brand

QZYL Christmas Decorations

Ideal Christmas Decoration from QZYL, great companion to spend a wonderful holiday

How did we get our start?

Christmas is the most important holiday of the year, decorate the house with family and celebrate Christmas.

What makes our products unique?

All of our Christmas decorations incorporate Christmas classic elements and designed by our designers to strive to do our best to design one-of-a-kind decorations to meet the needs and ensure each item is unique and excellent.

What problem are we solving?

All our Christmas decoration are made of high-quality materials, and the products will be inspected one by one to ensure the products are delivered in the best condition.

Christmas Collapsible Snowman

Holiday Indoor Decorations

410ft String Lights Outdoor

Christmas Lighted Decorations

Reindeer and Flocking Snow

Christmas Dinnerware Set

QZYL Holiday Decorations

RGB Strip Lights

Unique Christmas Decoration – Mr. Snowman wearing a red holly decorated Christmas hat and red and white striped scarf standing in the snow, holding Christmas lights charms in both hands to spread the joy of Christmas to you
Outdoor Christmas Decoration – The collapsible Christmas snowmen decoration comes with 4 pre-lit LED lights for nighttime display, lighting up your yard or porch on Christmas night.
Durable and Portable – Our 4FT collapsible decoration snowmen are made from a durable metal stand and Scallion cloth, very supportive and durable to use. Can be folded up and stored when not in use.
Easy to Install – Just insert the two poles with the metal stand then hang the string lights on the stand. Slowly release the telescoping section and hook the bottom loop to secure. Insert the two arms and hang the necklace decorations.
Wide Usage – Perfect Christmas lights decor for indoors and outdoor Christmas decorations, Christmas yard decorations, Christmas party decorations, and also ideal Christmas gifts for the family to decorate home porch garden fireplace, etc.

Collapsible Lighted Christmas Snowman

  • Light-up snowmen are the perfect Christmas outdoor decoration.
  • It comes with classic Christmas elements like a red hat, a red striped scarf, and a colorful necklace.
  • The snowman’s built-in LED lights make it visible at night. Light up the outdoors or indoors to create a warm and festive atmosphere in your home.
  • Give it to your family and friends as a Christmas gift.
  • Perfect for Christmas-themed parties, Christmas indoor and outdoor decoration, or Christmas yard decoration, holidays, New Year, and all kinds of parties

Package Includes

  • 1 x 4 FT Lighted Christmas Snowmen
  • 1 x Metal Round Base
  • 1 x Colorful Necklace Banner
  • 1 x Red Striped Scarf
  • 1 x 4 LED String Lights
  • 2 x Removable Hands
  • 2 x Steel Tubes
  • 4 x Lawn Stakes

[ Safe to Use ] Comes with a power adapter, 10 ft leading wire for convenient use. This lighted Christmas gift boxes work on very low voltage (4.5V-0.8A) and will not overheat after many hours of use, safe for your family.
[ Materials & Easy Storage ] Made of yarn material with metal framework inside, making them stable and durable for long time repeated use. These gift boxes can be overlapped one-by-one for storage, carry and space-saving.
